SourceText: What information does the app collect about you and how do we use it?
text: Programu tumishi inakusanya taarifa gani kukuhusu na tunaitumiaje taarifa hiyo?

SourceText:
_Personal Data_
For the purpose of this @global.privacy_policy, 'personal data' means any information that enables us to identify an individual, directly or indirectly. We collect data as follows:
-  Name or nickname
-  Gender
-  Parent ID

All data collected is linked to your unique ParentApp identification number. The ParentApp identification number produced within the app may also be used to link with any out of app surveys conducted.

We process your data to provide parenting support to you, communicate when you contact us, for security reasons as well as research purposes (see section ‘Information Sharing’). The primary research purpose includes optimising engagement of a digital parenting intervention (use of ParentApp) to prevent violence against children. During the course of research, the study team may use aggregated and anonymised data from the app for further research projects. Finally, please note that we may process your data without your knowledge or consent, where this is required or permitted by law.

The processing of your personal data is primarily based on:

The @global.app_name team has legitimate interests in carrying out research activities, under Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR, regarding the sharing of details related to how you use the app; and

Your consent, under Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR, regarding the email address you provide at the point of Google Sign-in and the sharing of answers you may provide to in-app questions (which may be linked to the as stated chosen username and gender which are entirely optional).

_Log Data_
Whenever you use our app, we collect data and information (through third party services) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data includes information such as a truncated device Internet Protocol ("IP") address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilising our app, the time, date and your intentions within the app (which include but are not limited to any app buttons clicked or pages visited.)

_Cookies_
Cookies are small files that store data, often used to save user-specific information. They allow websites and apps to retrieve this stored information, enabling a more personalised and efficient user experience.

We use a number of third party services (see relevant section below) to support the functioning of the app. We use third party cookies through Firebase and GlitchTip and first party cookies through Matomo. In short, first-party cookies are from @global.app_name, and third-party cookies come from other places as described.

For further information on the handling of cookies see below:
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)
- [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/blog/2020/02/web-analytics-cookies-gdpr/)

You have the option to adjust your browser settings to decline all or specific browser cookies or to notify you when sites initiate or access cookies. For android devices this should be done on the google chrome app. Remember, disabling cookies can affect the functionality of websites or web apps, as they may rely on these cookies for essential features. Always be sure about your decision before making these changes.

_Feedback Submissions_
Your feedback on the app is important to us. We shall always anonymise your personal information when sharing and publishing your feedback.

_Aggregate Data_
Your data is important to the @global.app_name team for broader research purposes. Aggregate data is always anonymised.
text:
_Taarifa binafsi_
Kwa madhumuni ya sera hii ya @global.privacy_policy, 'data ya kibinafsi' inamaanisha taarifa yoyote inayotuwezesha kumtambua mtu, moja kwa moja au isivyo moja kwa moja. Tunakusanya data kama ifuatavyo:
- Jina au jina la utani
- Jinsia
- Utambulisho wa mzazi

Data yote iliyokusanywa imeunganishwa na nambari yako ya kipekee ya utambulisho ya ParentApp. Nambari ya utambulisho ya ParentApp inayotolewa ndani ya programu inaweza pia kutumika kuunganisha na utafiti wowote nje ya programu uliofanywa

Tunachakata data yako ili kukupa usaidizi wa malezi, kuwasiliana unapowasiliana nasi, kwa sababu za usalama na pia madhumuni ya utafiti (angalia sehemu ya ‘Kushiriki Taarifa’). Madhumuni ya kimsingi ya utafiti ni pamoja na kuboresha ushirikishwaji wa utoaii programu ya malezi ya  kidijitali (matumizi ya ParentApp) ili kuzuia ukatili dhidi ya watoto. Wakati wa utafiti, timu ya utafiti inaweza kutumia data iliyojumlishwa na isiyojulikana kutoka kwa programu kwa miradi zaidi ya utafiti. Hatimaye, tafadhali kumbuka kwamba tunaweza kuchakata data yako bila kujua au idhini yako, ambapo hii inahitajika au inaruhusiwa na sheria.

Uchakataji wa data yako ya kibinafsi unategemea kimsingi:

Timu ya @global.app_name ina maslahi halali katika kutekeleza shughuli za utafiti, chini ya Sheria. 6(1)(f) GDPR, kuhusu kushiriki maelezo yanayohusiana na jinsi unavyotumia programu; na

Idhini yako, chini ya Sheria. 6(1)(a) GDPR, kuhusu anwani ya barua pepe unayotoa wakati wa Kuingia kwa Kutumia Google na kushiriki majibu unayoweza kutoa kwa maswali ya ndani ya programu (yanayoweza kuunganishwa na jina la mtumiaji na jinsia iliyochaguliwa kama ilivyobainishwa. ni chaguo kabisa).

_Data ya kumbukumbu_
Wakati wowote unapotumia programu yetu, tunakusanya data na maelezo (kupitia huduma za watu wengine) kwenye simu yako inayoitwa Data ya Kumbukumbu. Data hii ya Kumbukumbu inajumuisha maelezo kama vile anwani ya Itifaki ya Mtandao ya kifaa iliyopunguzwa ("IP"), jina la kifaa, toleo la mfumo wa uendeshaji, usanidi wa programu unapotumia programu yetu, saa, tarehe na nia yako ndani ya programu (ambayo ni pamoja na lakini hazizuiliwi na vitufe vyovyote vya programu vilivyobofya au kurasa zilizotembelewa.)

_Vidakuzi_
Vidakuzi ni faili ndogo zinazohifadhi data, mara nyingi hutumika kuhifadhi maelezo mahususi ya mtumiaji. Huruhusu tovuti na programu kuepua maelezo haya yaliyohifadhiwa, na hivyo kuwezesha utumiaji uliobinafsishwa na ufanisi zaidi.

Tunatumia  huduma za wahusika wengine (tazama sehemu husika hapa chini) kusaidia utendakazi wa programu. Tunatumia vidakuzi vya watu wengine kupitia Firebase na GlitchTip na vidakuzi vya mtu wa kwanza kupitia Matomo. Kwa kifupi, vidakuzi vya mtu wa kwanza vinatoka @global.app_name, na vidakuzi vya watu wengine vinatoka sehemu zingine kama ilivyoelezwa.

Kwa maelezo zaidi juu ya utunzaji wa vidakuzi tazama hapa chini:
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)
- [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/blog/2020/02/web-analytics-cookies-gdpr/)

Una chaguo la kurekebisha mipangilio ya kivinjari chako ili kukataa vidakuzi vyote au maalum vya kivinjari au kukuarifu tovuti zinapoanzisha au kufikia vidakuzi. Kwa vifaa vya android hii inapaswa kufanywa kwenye programu ya google chrome. Kumbuka, kuzima vidakuzi kunaweza kuathiri utendakazi wa tovuti au programu za wavuti, kwa kuwa zinaweza kutegemea vidakuzi hivi kwa vipengele muhimu. Daima kuwa na uhakika kuhusu uamuzi wako kabla ya kufanya mabadiliko haya.

_Mawasilisho ya Maoni_
Maoni yako kuhusu programu ni muhimu kwetu. Daima tutaficha maelezo yako ya kibinafsi tunaposhiriki na kuchapisha maoni yako.

_Jumla ya Data_
Data yako ni muhimu kwa timu ya @global.app_name kwa madhumuni ya utafiti mpana. Data iliyojumlishwa daima haitambuliwi.

SourceText: How we get your personal information and why we collect it
text: Jinsi tunavyopata maelezo yako ya kibinafsi na kwa nini tunayakusanya

SourceText:
We process your data to provide support to you as a parent / caregiver as well as process your data to communicate when you contact us, for security reasons as well as research purposes (see section ‘Information Sharing’). 

The primary research purpose includes looking to investigate the extent to which @global.app_name can support the interactions of parents and caregivers of young children. Parents and caregivers will be receiving primary parenting messages by accessing the modules of the app as well as enjoy shared reading experiences with their child. During the course of research, the study team may use aggregated and anonymised data from the app for further research projects. Finally, please note that we may process your data without your knowledge or consent, where this is required or permitted by law.
text:
Tunachakata taarifa zako ili kukupa usaidizi wa malezi, unapowasiliana nasi, kwa sababu za usalama na pia madhumuni ya utafiti (angalia sehemu ya ‘Kushirikishana Taarifa’).

 Madhumuni ya kimsingi ya utafiti ni pamoja na kuchunguza kwa kiasi gani @global.app_name inaweza kusaidia mahusiano kati ya mzazi na walezi wa watoto wadogo. Wazazi na walezi watakuwa wakipokea ujumbe wa malezi kwa kupiia vipindi ndani ya programu na pia kufurahia kusoma pamoja na watoto wao. Katika kipindi hichi cha utafiti, timu ya utafiti inaweza kutumia taarifa zilizojumlishwa na zisizokuwa na utambulisho kutoka katika programu tumishi kwa programu zaidi ya utafiti. Hatimaye, tafadhali kumbuka kwamba tunaweza kuchakata taarifa yako bila kujua au idhini yako, ambapo hii inahitajika au inaruhusiwa na sheria.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Information Sharing
text: Kushirikisha Taarifa

SourceText:
Limited internal IDEMS staff may have access to log data collected via the app, as necessary to perform their duties regarding the operation of the app. These data will only be accessed on a need-to-know basis, and all team members with access to the data are bound to confidentiality.

You agree that your personal information may be shared with third parties such as researchers and partners involved in the improvement or implementation of the app including those outside your country. Prior to the disclosure of information with research partners we will make anonymous to the extent possible and where appropriate information such as log data. In reading and accepting this @global.privacy_policy, you permit us to use your anonymised data in published research.

You agree that we may transfer your log data outside your country, for example, to administer cloud services. We will ensure that any country, company or person that we pass your personal information to agrees to treat your information with the same level of protection as we are obliged to.

_Legal_
The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this @global.privacy_policy.
text:
Wafanyakazi wa ndani wa IDEMS wanaweza kufikia data ya kumbukumbu iliyokusanywa kupitia programu, inapohitajika ili kutekeleza majukumu yao kuhusu uendeshaji wa programu. Data hizi zitafikiwa kwa misingi ya hitaji la kujua, na washiriki wote wa timu walio na ufikiaji wa data ni lazima wawe usiri.

Unakubali kwamba maelezo yako ya kibinafsi yanaweza kushirikiwa na washirika wengine kama vile watafiti na washirika wanaohusika katika uboreshaji au utekelezaji wa programu ikiwa ni pamoja na wale walio nje ya nchi yako. Kabla ya ufichuaji wa taarifa na washirika wa utafiti, tutafanya bila majina kwa kadiri tuwezavyo na inapofaa taarifa kama vile data ya kumbukumbu. Katika kusoma na kukubali hii @global.privacy_policy, unaturuhusu kutumia data yako isiyojulikana katika utafiti uliochapishwa.

Unakubali kwamba tunaweza kuhamisha data yako ya kumbukumbu nje ya nchi yako, kwa mfano, ili kusimamia huduma za wingu. Tutahakikisha kwamba nchi, kampuni au mtu yeyote ambaye tunapitisha taarifa zako za kibinafsi anakubali kushughulikia maelezo yako kwa kiwango sawa cha ulinzi tunachowajibika.

_Kisheria_
Taarifa tunazoomba tutazihifadhi na kuzitumia kama ilivyoelezwa katika sera hii ya @global.privacy_policy.

SourceText: Third Party Service Providers and Websites
text: Watoa Huduma na Tovuti za Wahusika wengine

SourceText:
The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you. We do so for the following reasons:
-   To facilitate our app
-   To provide the app on our behalf
-   To perform app-related services; or
-   To assist us in analysing how our app is used.

We want to inform users of this app that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Links to the privacy policies of third-party service providers used by the app:
-   [Google Play Services](https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/)
-   [Google Analytics for Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/policies/analytics)
-   [Sentry](https://sentry.io/privacy/)
-   [Matomo](https://matomo.org/privacy-policy/)
-   [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)

This app may contain links to other sites that are not covered by this @global.privacy_policy. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. This @global.privacy_policy applies only to the processing of your information by this app. It does not address, and we are not responsible for, the privacy, information, or other practices of any third parties, including any third party operating any site or service to which this app links to.
text:
Programu hutumia huduma za watu wengine ambazo zinaweza kukusanya taarifa zinazotumiwa kukutambulisha. Tunafanya hivyo kwa sababu zifuatazo:
- Ili kuwezesha programu yetu
- Ili kutoa programu kwa niaba yetu
- Kufanya huduma zinazohusiana na programu; au
- Ili kutusaidia katika kuchambua jinsi programu yetu inatumiwa.

Tunataka kuwafahamisha watumiaji wa programu hii kwamba wahusika hawa wengine wanaweza kufikia Taarifa zako za Kibinafsi. Sababu ni kufanya kazi walizopewa kwa niaba yetu. Walakini, wanalazimika kutofichua au kutumia habari kwa madhumuni mengine yoyote.

Linki za sera za faragha za watoa huduma wengine zinazotumiwa na programu:
- [Huduma za Google Play](https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/)
- [Google Analytics for Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/policies/analytics)
- [Sentry](https://sentry.io/privacy/)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/privacy-policy/)
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)

Programu hii inaweza kuwa na linki za  tovuti zingine ambazo hazijashughulikiwa na sera hii ya @global.privacy_policy. Ukibofya liniki ya  mtu wa tatu, utaelekezwa kwenye tovuti hiyo. Hii @global.privacy_policy inatumika tu kwa uchakataji wa maelezo yako na programu hii. Haishughulikii, na hatuwajibikii, faragha, taarifa, au desturi nyingine za wahusika wengine, ikiwa ni pamoja na wahusika wengine wanaoendesha tovuti au huduma yoyote ambayo programu hii inaunganisha nayo.

SourceText: How long do we keep your data?
text: Je, tunahifadhi taarifa yako kwa muda gani?

SourceText: We will retain your personal information for as long as we need it to fulfill our purposes, including any relating to app services as well as legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
text: Tutahifadhi maelezo yako ya kibinafsi kwa muda ambao tutayahitaji ili kutimiza madhumuni yetu, ikiwa ni pamoja na yoyote yanayohusiana na huduma za programu pamoja na mahitaji ya kisheria, uhasibu au mahitaji ya kuripoti.

SourceText: How do we keep your data secure?
text: Je, tunawekaje taarifa zako salama?

SourceText: We value your trust in providing us your personal information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security. We also reserve the right to the storage of your data on third party servers or databases outside of the listed @global.app_name team (refer to the section on Third Party Service Providers and Websites). Therefore usage of the app is at your own risk.
text: Tunathamini uaminifu wako kwa kutupa taarifa zako binafsi, kwa hivyo tunajitahidi kutumia njia zinazokubalika kibiashara kuzilinda. Lakini kumbuka kuwa hakuna njia ya uwasilishaji kupitia mtandao, au njia ya uhifadhi wa kielektroniki ambayo ni salama na ya kuaminika kwa 100%, na hatuwezi kuhakikisha usalama wake kamili. Pia tunahifadhi haki ya kutunza taarifa yako kwenye kanzidata za watu wengine au kuhifadhi taarifa nje ya timu iliyoorodheshwa ya @global.app_name (rejelea sehemu ya Watoa Huduma na Wavuti za Wahusika Wengine) Kwa hivyo matumizi ya programu ni kwa taadhari yako mwenyewe.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Children’s Privacy
text: Faragha ya Watoto

SourceText: This app is not targeted towards anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from individuals under 18.
text: Programu hii haijalengwa mtu yeyote aliye na umri wa chini ya miaka 18. Hatukusanyi taarifa zinazoweza kumtambulisha mtu binafsi kutoka kwa watu walio chini ya miaka 18 kimakusudi.

SourceText: Your data protection rights
text: Haki zako za ulinzi wa taarifa

SourceText:
Under data protection law, you have rights including:

_Your right of access_ - You have the right to ask us for copies of your personal information.

_Your right to rectification_ - You have the right to ask us to rectify personal information you think is inaccurate. You also have the right to ask us to complete information you think is incomplete.

_Your right to erasure_ - You have the right to ask us to erase your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to withdraw consent for data processing at any time_ - You can choose to halt the processing of your data if consent was the legal basis for handling your information.

_Your right to restriction of processing_ - You have the right to ask us to restrict the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to object to processing_ - You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to data portability_ - You have the right to ask that we transfer the personal information you gave us to another organisation, or to you, in certain circumstances.

You are not required to pay any charge for exercising your rights. Depending on the circumstances and the nature of your request it may not be possible for us to do what you have asked, for example, where there is a statutory or contractual requirement for us to process your data and it would not be possible to fulfil our legal obligations if we were to stop. Further information on your rights is available from the [Information Commissioner's Office (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).
text:
Chini ya sheria ya ulinzi wa data, una haki ikijumuisha:

_Haki yako ya kufikia_ - Una haki ya kutuuliza nakala za maelezo yako ya kibinafsi.

_Haki yako ya kusahihishwa_ - Una haki ya kutuuliza turekebishe maelezo ya kibinafsi ambayo unafikiri si sahihi. Pia una haki ya kutuuliza tukamilishe maelezo ambayo unafikiri hayajakamilika.

_Haki yako ya kufuta_ - Una haki ya kutuomba tufute maelezo yako ya kibinafsi katika hali fulani.

_Haki yako ya kuondoa kibali cha kuchakata data wakati wowote_ - Unaweza kuchagua kusitisha uchakataji wa data yako ikiwa kibali kilikuwa msingi wa kisheria wa kushughulikia maelezo yako.

_Haki yako ya kizuizi cha uchakataji_ - Una haki ya kutuuliza tuwekee vikwazo uchakataji wa taarifa zako za kibinafsi katika hali fulani.

_Haki yako ya kupinga kuchakatwa_ - Una haki ya kupinga uchakataji wa taarifa zako za kibinafsi katika hali fulani.

_Haki yako ya kubebeka kwa data_ - Una haki ya kuomba tuhamishe taarifa za kibinafsi ulizotupa kwa shirika lingine, au kwako, katika hali fulani.

Hutakiwi kulipa malipo yoyote kwa kutumia haki zako. Kulingana na mazingira na aina ya ombi lako huenda isiwezekane kwetu kufanya ulichoomba, kwa mfano, pale ambapo kuna mahitaji ya kisheria au ya kimkataba ili sisi kuchakata data yako na haingewezekana kutimiza wajibu wetu. majukumu ya kisheria ikiwa tungeacha. Taarifa zaidi kuhusu haki zako zinapatikana kutoka [Ofisi ya Kamishna wa Habari (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).

SourceText: Removing the app
text: Kuondoa programu tumishi

SourceText: We are sorry if you find our app no longer useful. Should you decide to remove our app, we may still retain some of your data (although anonymised) to troubleshoot, aid in investigations, comply with legal requirements or to add to our existing research data sets.
text: Samahani ikiwa unaona programu tumishi yetu haina maana tena. Iwapo utaamua kuondoa programu tumishi yetu, bado tunaweza kuhifadhi baadhi ya data yako (ingawa hatujulikani) ili kutatua matatizo, kusaidia uchunguzi, kutii mahitaji ya kisheria au kuongeza kwenye seti zetu zilizopo za data za utafiti.

SourceText: Changes to the @global.privacy_policy
text: Mabadiliko ya @global.privacy_policy
note: The string @global.privacy_policy should not be translated.

SourceText: We may update our @global.privacy_policy from time to time. You waive your right to be notified directly of changes and are advised to review this page periodically for any updates. Your continued use of the app suggests you agree to subsequent revisions of the @global.privacy_policy.
text: Tunaweza kuboresha @global.privacy_policy mara kwa mara. Unaachilia haki yako ya kuarifiwa moja kwa moja kuhusu mabadiliko na unashauriwa kukagua ukurasa huu mara kwa mara kwa masasisho yoyote. Kuendelea kwako kutumia programu kunapendekeza ukubali masahihisho yajayo ya sera ya @global.privacy_policy.

SourceText:
If you have any questions or suggestions about our @global.privacy_policy, complaints or otherwise do not hesitate to contact us at <apps@idems.international>.

If your concerns are not adequately addressed, you retain the right to file a complaint with the Information Commissioner's Office. You can reach them at 03031231113, contact them via https://ico.org.uk/global/contact-us/, or mail to the Information Commissioner’s Office, Wycliffe House, Water Lane, Wilmslow, Cheshire, SK9 5AF, England, UK.

text:

Ikiwa hoja zako hazijashughulikiwa ipasavyo, unabaki na haki ya kuwasilisha malalamiko kwa Ofisi ya Kamishna wa Habari. Unaweza kuwafikia kwa 03031231113, wasiliana nao kupitia https://ico.org.uk/global/contact-us/, au utume barua kwa Ofisi ya Kamishna wa Habari, Wycliffe House, Water Lane, Wilmslow, Cheshire, SK9 5AF, Uingereza, Uingereza.

SourceText: User Agreement
text: Makubaliano ya Mtumiaji

SourceText: Rules of Usage
text: Kanuni za Matumizi

SourceText: @global.app_name is open-source, which means that its codebase can be found on GitHub for the wider software developer community. However, it's against the terms of use to alter the existing application or its materials, or to replicate any trademarks from the @global.app_name team. Although open source, refrain from translating the software into other languages or creating alternate versions without crediting the @global.app_name team. Unauthorised access to confidential user data is forbidden. It's not acceptable to provide false information about yourself when using the app, make unfounded claims of affiliation, or inaccurately report the app's behaviour. Ensure that your usage of the app adheres to all local rules and laws. Finally in accessing and using the app, we believe you not to be a minor in your country of residence.
text: @global.app_name ni chanzo huria, ambayo ina maana kwamba codebase yake inaweza kupatikana kwenye GitHub kwa jumuiya pana ya wasanidi programu. Hata hivyo, ni kinyume na sheria na masharti ya kubadilisha programu iliyopo au nyenzo zake, au kunakili chapa zozote za biashara kutoka kwa timu ya @global.app_name. Ingawa ni chanzo huria, jiepushe na kutafsiri programu katika lugha nyingine au kuunda matoleo mbadala bila kuweka alama ya @global.app_name timu. Ufikiaji usioidhinishwa wa data ya siri ya mtumiaji hauruhusiwi. Haikubaliki kutoa maelezo ya uwongo kukuhusu unapotumia programu, kutoa madai yasiyo na msingi ya ushirika, au kuripoti tabia ya programu kwa njia isiyo sahihi. Hakikisha kwamba matumizi yako ya programu yanazingatia kanuni na sheria zote za eneo lako. Hatimaye katika kufikia na kutumia programu, tunaamini kuwa wewe si mtoto katika nchi yako ya makazi.

SourceText: Content Changes
text: Mabadiliko ya Maudhui

SourceText:
The @global.app_name team is committed to ensuring that the app is as useful and user friendly as possible. For that reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the app which will be delivered through updates. At present the app is free of charge and our intention is for it to stay that way.

In the future it is possible that some services may be offered that would incur a cost. We will never charge you for the app or its services without clearly making known to you first any access charges applicable.
text:
Timu ya @global.app_name imejitolea kuhakikisha kuwa programu ni muhimu na rahisi kwa watumiaji iwezekanavyo. Kwa sababu hiyo, tunahifadhi haki ya kufanya mabadiliko kwenye programu ambayo yatawasilishwa kupitia masasisho. Kwa sasa programu haina malipo na nia yetu ni kukaa hivyo.

SourceText: Security
text: Usalama

SourceText:
Our app stores and processes personal data that you have provided to us, in order to offer our services. It is your responsibility to keep your phone and access to the app secure. Removal of software restrictions and limitations imposed by the official operating system of your device is therefore not recommended. Doing so could make your phone vulnerable to malware, viruses, malicious programs as well as compromise your phone’s security features and could mean that the app will not work properly or at all.

To see how we handle your personal information, please see our @global.privacy_policy.
text:

Kuondolewa kwa vikwazo vya programu na vikwazo vilivyowekwa na mfumo rasmi wa uendeshaji wa kifaa chako haipendekezi. Kufanya hivyo kunaweza kufanya simu yako kuwa hatarini kwa programu hasidi, virusi, programu hasidi na pia kuathiri vipengele vya usalama vya simu yako na kunaweza kumaanisha kuwa programu haitafanya kazi ipasavyo au hata kidogo.

Ili kuona jinsi tunavyoshughulikia taarifa zako za kibinafsi, tafadhali tazama sera yetu ya @global.privacy_policy.

SourceText: Disclaimer
text: Kanusho

SourceText:
Please be aware that the @global.app_name team exclude responsibility for the following:

1. Certain functions of the app will require the app to have an active internet connection. The @global.app_name team cannot take responsibility for the app not working at full functionality if you do not have access to Wi-Fi, or you do not have any of your data allowance left.

2. Using the app outside of an area with Wi-Fi, will mean that your terms of agreement with your mobile network provider will still apply. As a result, you may be charged by your mobile provider for the cost of data for the duration of the connection while accessing the app, or other third party charges. In using the app, you accept responsibility for any such charges, including roaming data charges if you use the app outside of your home territory (i.e. region or country) without turning off data roaming. If you are not the bill payer for the device on which you are using the app, please be aware that we assume that you have received permission from the bill payer for using the app.

3. Although we endeavour to ensure that the app is updated and its content accurate, we do rely on third parties to provide information to us so that we can make it available to you. We do not regularly review all of the external sites and cannot guarantee that they are always accurate or reliable.

4. The @global.app_name team accepts no liability for any damage or loss, direct or indirect, you experience as a result of using the app, or arising from any reliance you may place on advice or information provided from the app. You should always exercise your own discretion and judgment appropriate to your own circumstances in relation to any advice or information provided from the app.

5. Any instances of software bugs, viruses or other malicious material transmitted by a third party through our site are a regret, but we are devoid of responsibility.

6. Updates to the app occur regularly in order to improve performance and content. The app is available on Android -- the requirements for this system (and for any additional systems we decide to extend the availability of the app to) may change. It is your responsibility to download app updates to keep using the app. The @global.app_name team does not promise that it will always update the app so that it is relevant to you and/or works with the Android version that you have installed on your device. However, you agree to always accept updates to the application when offered to you.

7. The app site might not be available at all times for reasons of maintenance or trouble with associated software or hardware. Whilst we apologise for inconveniences, we are not liable for any loss you may incur should the site not be accessible or is withdrawn. Equally, we have the right and choice to terminate your access and use of the app (including availability of captured data) at any time, without warning. Unless we tell you otherwise, upon any termination, (a) the rights and licenses granted to you in these terms will end; (b) you must stop using the app, and (if needed) delete it from your device.

8. You agree to indemnify, at your own expense, the @global.app_name, its officials, employees, consultants and agents, against any claims, including your costs and expenses, by any third party, resulting from your use of the app.

9. Companies or products associated with the app should not be interpreted as endorsement by the app or the @global.app_name team or demonstrate an intention to infringe proprietary rights.
text:
Tafadhali fahamu kuwa timu ya @global.app_name haijumuishi wajibu wa yafuatayo:

1. Baadhi ya utendakazi wa programu utahitaji programu kuwa na muunganisho unaotumika wa intaneti. Timu ya @global.app_name haiwezi kuwajibika kwa programu kutofanya kazi kikamilifu ikiwa huna ufikiaji wa Wi-Fi, au huna posho yoyote ya data iliyosalia.

2. Kutumia programu nje ya eneo lenye Wi-Fi, kutamaanisha kuwa masharti yako ya makubaliano na mtoa huduma wako wa mtandao wa simu bado yatatumika. Kwa hivyo, unaweza kutozwa na mtoa huduma wako wa simu kwa gharama ya data kwa muda wa muunganisho unapofikia programu, au gharama zingine za watu wengine. Katika kutumia programu, unakubali kuwajibika kwa gharama zozote kama hizo, ikiwa ni pamoja na gharama za data ya kutumia mitandao ya ng'ambo ikiwa unatumia programu nje ya eneo lako la nyumbani (yaani, eneo au nchi) bila kuzima utumiaji wa data nje ya mtandao wako. Ikiwa wewe si mlipaji bili wa kifaa ambacho unatumia programu, tafadhali fahamu kwamba tunadhania kuwa umepokea ruhusa kutoka kwa mlipaji bili kwa kutumia programu.

3. Ingawa tunajitahidi kuhakikisha kuwa programu imesasishwa na maudhui yake ni sahihi, tunategemea washirika wengine kutupa taarifa ili tuweze kuyapata kwako. Hatuhakiki mara kwa mara tovuti zote za nje na hatuwezi kuhakikisha kuwa ni sahihi au za kuaminika kila wakati.

4. Timu ya @global.app_name haikubali dhima yoyote ya uharibifu au hasara yoyote, ya moja kwa moja au isiyo ya moja kwa moja, unayopata kutokana na kutumia programu, au kutokana na utegemezi wowote unaoweza kuweka kwa ushauri au taarifa iliyotolewa kutoka kwa programu. Unapaswa kutumia busara na uamuzi wako kila wakati kulingana na hali yako kuhusiana na ushauri au taarifa yoyote iliyotolewa kutoka kwa programu.

5. Matukio yoyote ya hitilafu za programu, virusi au nyenzo zingine hasidi zinazopitishwa na mtu mwingine kupitia tovuti yetu ni majuto, lakini hatuwajibiki.

6. Masasisho ya programu hutokea mara kwa mara ili kuboresha utendaji na maudhui. Programu inapatikana kwenye Android -- mahitaji ya mfumo huu (na kwa mifumo yoyote ya ziada tunayoamua kupanua upatikanaji wa programu) inaweza kubadilika. Ni wajibu wako kupakua masasisho ya programu ili kuendelea kutumia programu. Timu ya @global.app_name haiahidi kuwa itasasisha programu kila wakati ili iwe muhimu kwako na/au kufanya kazi na toleo la Android ambalo umesakinisha kwenye kifaa chako. Hata hivyo, unakubali kila mara kukubali masasisho ya programu yanapotolewa kwako.

7. Tovuti ya programu huenda isipatikane wakati wote kwa sababu za matengenezo au matatizo na programu au maunzi yanayohusiana. Ingawa tunaomba radhi kwa usumbufu, hatuwajibikii kwa hasara yoyote unayoweza kupata iwapo tovuti haitapatikana au kuondolewa. Vile vile, tuna haki na chaguo la kusitisha ufikiaji na matumizi yako ya programu (ikiwa ni pamoja na upatikanaji wa data iliyonaswa) wakati wowote, bila onyo. Isipokuwa tukikuambia vinginevyo, baada ya kusitishwa, (a) haki na leseni ulizopewa katika masharti haya zitaisha; (b) lazima uache kutumia programu, na (ikihitajika) uifute kwenye kifaa chako.

8. Unakubali kufidia, kwa gharama yako mwenyewe, jina la @global.app_name, maafisa wake, wafanyakazi, washauri na mawakala, dhidi ya madai yoyote, ikiwa ni pamoja na gharama na gharama zako, na wahusika wengine, kutokana na matumizi yako ya programu.

9. Makampuni au bidhaa zinazohusishwa na programu hazipaswi kutafsiriwa kama uidhinishaji na programu au timu ya @global.app_name au kuonyesha nia ya kukiuka haki za umiliki.

SourceText: @global.app_name is an app designed by IDEMS International and Parenting for Lifelong Health to support parents and caregivers of children 2 to 9 years of age. The content herein is available under an open source Creative Commons International 4.0 license. It was developed in collaboration with key partners:
text: @global.app_name ni programu iliyoundwa na IDEMS na Parenting for Lifeling Health kusaidia wazazi na walezi wenye watoto wa umri wa miaka 2 mpaka 9. Maudhui ya humu yanapatikana chini ya leseni huria ya Creative Common International 4.0. Yaliundwa kuwa kushirikiana na washirika muhimu:
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Reba Wants Ice Cream
text: Reba anataka lamba lamba

SourceText: When Reba comes home, she realises that a shopkeeper has given her too much change. Should she tell the shopkeeper the truth?
text: Reba alipokuja nyumbani, aligundua kuwa muuza duka alimzidishia chenji. Je, amwambie muuza duka ukweli?

SourceText: "Ice cream! Ice cream!" The shopkeeper called.
text: "Lamba lamba! Lamba lamba!" Muuza duka aliita.

SourceText: Reba ran to her mother. "Ma! Ma! I want ice cream!" "Finish your homework first," said Ma.
text: Reba alikimbilia kwa mama yake. "Mama! Mama! Nataka lamba lamba!" "Maliza kazi yako ya nyumbani kwanza," alisema Mama.

SourceText: Reba looked unhappy. Ma asked, "Are you done with your homework yet?" "Mmm...No. But my notebook is full! I need to buy another one."
text: Reba alionekana hana furaha. Mama aliuliza, " bado hujamaliza kazi yako ya nyumbani?" "Mmm... Hapana. Lakini daftari langu limejaa! Nahitaji kununua lingine"

SourceText: Ma gave Reba 50 taka*. "Go buy a notebook. We also need a bar of soap." *Taka is the name of currency used in Bangladesh.
text: Mama alimpa Reba taka 50*. " Nenda kanunue daftari. Pia tunahitaji sabuni ya kipande." *Taka ni jina la fedha inayotumika Bangladesh.

SourceText: Reba went to the shop. The shopkeeper gave Reba a notebook and a bar of soap. "How much?" asked Reba.
text: Reba alienda dukani. Muuza duka alimpa Reba daftari na kipande cha sabuni. " Shilingi ngapi?" Reba aliuliza.

SourceText: "The notebook is 20 taka, and the soap is 20 taka," said the shopkeeper. "That means the total cost is 40 taka. Here’s your change."
text: "Daftari ni taka 20, na sabuni ni taka 20," alisema muuza duka. " Hivyo inagharimu jumla ya taka 40. Hii hapa chenji yako."

SourceText: When Reba came back home, she calculated her change.Reba gave the shopkeeper 50 taka. The notebook was 20 taka, and the soap was 20 taka.
text: Reba aliporudi nyumbani, alifanya hesabu ya chenji yake. Reba alimpa muuza duka taka 50. Daftari ilikuwa taka 20, na sabuni ilikuwa taka 20.

SourceText: "I should only get 10 taka back," thought Reba. "Why did the shopkeeper give me 20 taka back?"
text: " Natakiwa nirudishiwe taka 10 tu," Reba aliwaza. "Kwanini muuza duka amenirudishia taka 20?"

SourceText: "That's great!" thought Reba. "I can buy ice cream with this extra money!"
text: "Safi" Reba aliwaza. "Naweza kununua lamba lamba kwa hela hii iliyozidi!"

SourceText: But Reba was ashamed of herself. "I should go back and give the shopkeeper the correct change."
text: Lakini Reba alijisikia kuaibika yeye mwenyewe. "Natakiwa nirudi na kumpa muuza duka chenji iliyo sahihi."

SourceText: Reba rushed back to the shop. There were so many kinds of ice creams that she wanted! "Oh, if only I could have an ice-cream!" she thought.
text: Reba alikimbia kurudi dukani. Kulikuwa na aina nyingi za lamba lamba alizozitaka! "Oh, si kama ningenunua tu lamba lamba!" aliwaza.

SourceText: When Reba got to the shop, she saw another girl who had just bought ice cream. She was about to go home. The shopkeeper stopped her. "Wait!" he said. "You've given me too much money. Come back, take the change."
text: Reba alipokuwa anaenda dukani, alimuona msichana mwingine ambaye alitoka punde kununua lamba lamba. Alikuwa anataka kwenda nyumbani. Muuza duka alimsimamisha. "Subiri!" alisema. "Umenipa pesa zaidi. Rudi uchukue chenji."

SourceText: The shopkeeper gave the girl her change. Reba stepped forward. "You gave me 10 extra taka. Please take your money back."
text: Muuza duka alimpa chenji yake. Reba alipiga hatua mbele. " Ulinipa taka 10 zaidi. Tafadhani chukua pesa yako."

SourceText: "You’re such an honest girl!" The shopkeeper was so happy with Reba’s honesty that he gave her an ice cream for free! Reba happily licked her ice cream all the way home.
text: "Wewe ni msichana mwaminifu" Muuza duka alifurahishwa sana na uaminifu wa Reba hivyo alimpa lamba lamba bure! Reba aliilamba lamba lamba yake kwa furaha akiwa anaelekea nyumbani.

SourceText: Rani's First Day at School
text: Siku ya kwanza ya Rani shuleni

SourceText: What does Rani see on her first day in school? How does she feel?
text: Rani anaona nini siku yake ya kwanza shuleni? Anajisikiaje?

SourceText: It is my first day at school. Mummy is holding my hand and walking with me. "I am grown up now," I say. "Let go, let go!" Mummy holds my hand very tight.
text: Ni siku yangu ya kwanza shuleni. Mama anashika mkono wangu na kutembea na mimi. "Nimekua sasa", nasema. "Twende, twende!" Mama alishika mkono wangu kwa nguvu.

SourceText: There are many children near the school. They come by bus. They come by car. They come by rickshaw. They cycle. They walk, like me.
text: Kuna watoto wengi jirani na shule. Wamekuja kwa basi. Wamekuja kwa gari. Wamekuja kwa riksho. Wanabaiskeli. Wanatembea kama mimi.

SourceText: We reach the gate. Mummy lets go of my hand. She stays at the gate. I have to go inside alone. There are many new faces all around me.
text: Tumefika getini. Mama achia mkono wangu. Anakaa getini. inabidi niingie ndani peke yangu. kuna sura mpya nyingi karibu na mimi.

SourceText: I take one step. I take another step. I look back. Mummy gets smaller as I walk away. Will she disappear? I run back to her. I don’t feel so grown up. I hold her hand. "Don’t go away," I say.
text: Nachukua hatua moja. Nachukua hatua nyingine. Naangalia nyuma. Mama anakosa furaha kadri ninavyoendelea kwenda. Je ataondoka? Nakimbia kurudi kwake. Sijisikii kuwa nimekuwa sana. Nikashika mkono wake.''usiondoke,'' Ninasema.

SourceText: Everyone is inside now. I am the only one outside. The teacher comes out. She smiles at me. I smile back. Mummy says, "Rani, I will be here when you come out."I let go of her hand. She waves to me.
text: Kila mmoja yuko ndani. Mimi tu niko nje. Mwalimu anatoka nje. Anatabasamu. Nikatabasamu pia. Mama anasema.''Rani, nitakuwa hapa utakapotoka nje.''Niliachia mkono wake. Ananipungia.

SourceText: I run inside. Mummy will be there after school!
text: Nikakimbilia ndani. Mama atakuwa hapa baada ya shule!

SourceText: Ma! Hurry Up!!
text: Mama! Harakisha!!

SourceText: The boy in the story is in a real hurry. Wouldn’t you like to find out why?
text: Mvulana wa kwenye hadithi ana haraka sana. Unapenda kujua kwanini?

SourceText: © Pratham Books, 2004. Some rights reserved. Released under CC BY 4.0 license.
text: ©Vitabu vya Pratham, 2004. Haki zingine zimehifadhiwa. Imetolewa chini ya Leseni ya CC BY 4.0.

SourceText: I wake up in the morning. I rub my eyes. I cannot see my mother. "Ma! Ma! Hurry up!!"
text: Naamka asubuhi. Nafikicha macho yangu. Simuoni mama yangu. "Mama! Mama! Harakisha!!''

SourceText: Ma is busy. She says, "Good morning. Get up! Go wash your face."
text: Mama ana kazi nyingi, "Habari ya asubuhi. Inuka! Nenda kaoshe uso wako."

SourceText: I wash my hands and face. I have a bath in a hurry. I want to go soon. "Ma, hurry up."
text: Nimeosha mikono yangu na uso. Nilioga haraka. Nataka kuondoka sasa hivi. "Mama! Harakisha."

SourceText: "Yes! I am coming," Ma says to me. "I have to boil the milk, then I will come."
text: ''Ndio nakuja," Mama ananiambia.''Natakiwa kuchemsha maziwa, alafu nitakuja.''

SourceText: I comb my hair and button my shirt. Now I am ready. "Ma, hurry up."
text: Ninachana nywele zangu na kufunga vifungo vya shati langu. Sasa niko tayari. ''Mama, harakisha.''

SourceText: Ma gives Didi her clothes. She helps Didi get ready. There is so much work in the morning. But I am in a hurry.
text: Mama anampa Didi nguo zake. Anamsaidia didi kujiandaa. Kuna kazi nyingi asubuhi. Lakini nina haraka.

SourceText: "Ma, I am getting late." I pick up my water bottle and school bag. I wear my chappals. "Come on let us go. Ma, hurry up."
text: ''Mama, Ninachelewa.'' Nikachukua chupa ayangu ya maji na begi la ashule. Nikavaa sandozi. ''Twende. Mama, harakisha.''

SourceText: "Yes! I am coming. Let me comb your sister’s hair. I need five minutes more and then we can go."
text: ''Ndio! Nakuja. Ngoja nimchane dada yako nywele. Nahitaji dakika tano zaidi alafu tunaweza kwenda.''

SourceText: I want to go now. I do not want to wait. I feel like crying. Didi has gone to school and I am still here.
text: Nataka kwenda sasa. Sitaki kusubiri. Naskia kulia. Didi amekwenda shule na mimi bado niko hapa.

SourceText: "I am almost done. I only have to fill water." She always has something to do. "Ma, please, please, hurry up."
text: ''Nakaribia kumaliza. Natakiwa kujaza maji tu.'' Kila mara anakuwa na kitu cha kufanya. ''Samahani mama, harakisha.''

SourceText: "I am going. You better come with me." I hold her hand and start pulling her. "Arre baba, let me switch off the lights."
text: '' Mimi naenda. Ni bora uje na mimi." Nashika mkono wake na kuanza kumvuta. "Baba, ngoja nizime taa."

SourceText: Finally we are out of the house. Mother locks the door. She says, "Why are you so impatient, my Raja?" I like it when she calls me "my Raja’. Now my mother is walking with me. I like that!!
text: Mwisho tumetoka nje ya nyumba. Mama anaangalia. Anasema, "Kwanini wewe sio mvumilivu Raja wangu?" "Napenda anaponiita Raja wangu". Sasa mama yangu anatembea na mimi. Hivyo ndivyo ninavyopenda!!

SourceText: I Like to Read
text: Napenda Kusoma

SourceText: A boy wants to read a book to someone but everybody is so busy!
text: Kijana anataka kumsomea mtu kitabu lakini kila mmoja ana kazi nyingi!

SourceText: © African Storybook Initiative, 2014. Some rights reserved. Released under CC BY 4.0 license.
text: © Mpango wa kitabu cha hadithi za Kiafrika, 2014. Haki zingine zimehifadhiwa. Imetolewa chini ya leseni ya CC BY 4.0.

SourceText: I like to read.
text: Napenda kusoma.

SourceText: My sister is asleep.
text: Dada yangu amelala.

SourceText: My mother and grandmother are busy.
text: Mama yangu na Bibi yangu wanakazi nyingi.

SourceText: Who can I read to?
text: Naweza kumsomea nani?

SourceText: My father and grandfather are busy.
text: Baba yangu na Bibi yangu wana kazi nyingi.

SourceText: Who can I read to? I can read to myself!
text: Naweza kumsomea nani? Naweza kujisomea mimi mwenyewe!

SourceText: It Wasn't Me!
text: Haikuwa mimi!

SourceText: Mom is going out for five minutes. What could go wrong?
text: Mama anatoka kwa dakika tano. Nini kinaweza kwenda vibaya?

SourceText: I won’t be long. Be good!
text: Sitachukua muda. Uwe na tabia njema!

SourceText: Oh, NO!
text: Oh, hapana!

SourceText: Crash!
text: Ajali!

SourceText: Hiss!
text: Hiss! (sauti ya mshtuko)!

SourceText: Oh!
text: Oh!

SourceText: Oh, no!
text: Oh, hapana!

SourceText: OH, NO!
text: OH, HAPANA!

SourceText: It wasn’t me!
text: Haikuwa mimi!

SourceText: Little Monkey's Lost Bananas
text: Ndizi zilizopotea za Tumbili mdogo

SourceText: Little Monkey’s home is always messy. One day, Little Monkey feels hungry but his house is so messy that he cannot find his bananas to eat! He asks the other animals in the forest if  they've seen his bananas. Do you think the other animals can help Little Monkey find his lost bananas?
text: Nyumbani kwa Ngedere mdogo daima kuna vurugu. Siku moja Ngedere mdogo alijiskia njaa lakini nyumba yake ina vurugu sana kiasi kwamba hawezi kuona ndizi za kula! Anamuuliza mnyama mwingine msituni ikiwa wameona ndizi zake. Unafikiri wanyama wengine wanaweza kumsaidia Ngedere mdogo kupata ndizi zake zilizopotea?

SourceText: Little Monkey lives in a house in a big tree. He never puts his things in order, so his house is very messy.
text: Ngedere mdogo anaishi katika nyumba kwenye mti mkubwa. Yeye huwa haweki vitu vyake kwa mpangilio, hivyo nyumba yake imechafuka sana.

SourceText: One morning, Little Monkey could be heard shouting from his tree house. "Where are they? They are gone! My bunch of bananas! Where have they gone?"
text: Asubuhi moja, Ngedere mdogo alisikika akipiga kelele kutoka nyumbani kwake mtini.''wako wapi? wameondoka! Mkungu wangu wa ndizi! wameenda wapi?''

SourceText: Little Monkey asked the bee. "Bee! Bee! Did you eat my bananas?" "Buzz! Buzz! Buzz!" responded the bee. "I eat nectar and pollen. I don’t eat bananas."
text: Ngedere mdogo alimuuliza nyuki.''Nyuki! Nyuki! Umekula ndizi zangu?'' Buzz! Buzz! Buzz! alijibu nyuki. nakula majimaji na polleni za maua. sili ndizi,''

SourceText: Little Monkey asked the snake. "Snake! Snake! Did you eat my bananas?" "Hiss! Hiss! Hiss!" responded the snake. "I don’t know  anything about your bananas. Don’t disturb me!"
text: Ngedere mdogo alimuuliza nyoka.''Nyoka! Nyoka! Umekula ndizi zangu?' ''Hiss! Hiss! Hiss!'' Nyoka alijibu. ''Sijui chochote kuhusu ndizi zako. usinisumbue mimi!''

SourceText: Little Monkey was hungry! "I have searched everywhere! Inside and outside... but my bananas are gone!"
text: Ngedere mdogo alikuwa na njaa! ''Nimetafuta kila mahali ndani na nje... lakini ndizi zangu hazipo!''

SourceText: He kept searching, looking on the table and under the bed. "I still can’t find them! I can’t find my bananas!"
text: Aliendelea kuzitafuta, anaangalia juu ya meza na chini ya kitanda, ''lakini siwezi kuzipata! Siwezi kuzipata ndizi zangu!""

SourceText: Little Monkey became very angry. He stomped his feet, crying, "I'm so hungry! My bananas are gone, and I have nothing to eat!"
text: Aliendelea kuzitafuta, anaangalia juu ya meza na chini ya kitanda, ''lakini siwezi kuzipata! Siwezi kuzipata ndizi zangu!""

SourceText: Little Monkey looked sadly out from his balcony. "Ah! Wait..."he said. "Those are banana peels! 1...2...3...4... so many!"
text: Aliendelea kuzitafuta, anaangalia juu ya meza na chini ya kitanda, ''lakini siwezi kuzipata! Siwezi kuzipata ndizi zangu!"

SourceText: "Oh! There's the rabbit! So he’s the one who ate my bananas!"
text: ''Oh! Kuna sungura! Kwa hiyo ni ndiye aliyekula ndizi zangu!''

SourceText: “Rabbit! You’re eating my bananas!” shouted Little Monkey. "No, Little Monkey. I’m not eating your bananas," responded the rabbit. "Look over there. I grow bananas!"
text: ''Sungura! Unakula ndizi zangu!''alipiga kelele Ngedere mdongo. Hapana Ngedere mdogo. Sijala ndizi zako.''Sungura alijibu.'' Angalia pale. Ninalima ndizi!''

SourceText: The rabbit came over to the base of Little Monkey's tree. "You sound very hungry," Rabbit said. "Here - take a bunch of my bananas." Little Monkey was happy. "Thank you! Thank you, Rabbit! But..."
text: Sungura alienda kwenye shina la mti wa Ngedere mdogo. "Unasikia njaa sana,'' Sungura alisema. ''Chukua hapa kichane cha ndizi zangu.'' Ngedere mdogo alifurahi. ''Asante! Asante, Sungura! Ila...''

SourceText: "Who... Who...Who took MY bananas?"
text: ''Nani... Nani... Nani amechukua ndizi zangu?''

SourceText: Suddenly, Little Monkey remembered. "Oh... Now I recall! I was very hungry last night. I ate all the bananas!"
text: Ghafla, Ngedere mdogo alikumbuka. ''Oh... Sasa nakumbuka! nilikuwa na njaa jana usiku. Nikala ndizi zote!''

SourceText: Busy Mother Hen
text: Mama Kuku Mwenye shughuli nyingi

SourceText: Mother Hen sits patiently waiting for her eggs to hatch. How long will it take? Is she going to miss the fair?
text: Mama kuku amekaa kwa subira anasubiri mayai yake yaanguliwe, Yatachukua muda gani? Je atakosa maonyesho?

SourceText: Mother Hen sits on her eggs. She waits and waits for her eggs to hatch.
text: Mama kuku amekaa kwenye mayai yake, Anasubiri na kusubiri mayai yake yaanguliwe.

SourceText: Mother Goat passes by."Will you go to the fair with me?” she asks Mother Hen. "I'm busy with my eggs," Mother Hen answers.
text: Mama mbuzi anapita. Je utakwenda na mimi kwenye maonyesho?'' Anamuuliza Mama Kuku, ''Nina shughuli nyingi na mayai yangu,'' Mama kuku alijibu.

SourceText: Mother Pig passes by. "Will you go to the fair with me?" she asks. "I'm busy with my eggs,” answers Mother Hen.
text: Mama nguruwe anapita.,''Je utakwenda na mimi kwenye maonyesho?''Anauliza.''Nina shughuli nyingi na maayai yangu anasema Mama Kuku.

SourceText: One, two, three, four, five, six. Six round eggs!
text: Moja, Mbili, tatu, nne, tano, sita. Mzunguko wa mayai sita!

SourceText: Mother Cow passes by. "Will you go to the fair with me?" she asks Mother Hen.
text: Mama Ngo'mbe anapita. Je utakwenda na mimi kwenye maonyesho?'' Anamuuliza mama kuku.

SourceText: "I'm busy with my eggs," answers Mother Hen.
text: ''Nina shughuli nyingi na mayai yangu,'' anajibu mama kuku.

SourceText: Mother Hen waits and waits. "When will I see my chicks?" she wonders.
text: Mama Kuku anasubiri na kusubiri. Ni lini nitaviona vifaranga vyangu?''anashangaa.

SourceText: Mother Hen feels something. What's happening?
text: Mama Kuku anahisi kitu. Nini kinaendelea?

SourceText: One, two, three, four, five, six. Crack! Crack! Crack! Crack! Crack! Crack!
text: Moja, mbili, tatu, nne, tano, sita Crack! Crack! Crack! Crack! Crack! Crack!

SourceText: Six chicks have hatched.
text: Vifaranga sita vimetotolewa.

SourceText: Mother Hen is happy with her lovely chicks.
text: Mama kuku anafurahi na vifaranga vyake vyakupendeza.

SourceText: Then she remembers. There is a fair today! Mother Goat, Mother Pig and Mother Cow have already left. Mother Hen is ready now. She will take her chicks to the fair. One, two, three, four, five, six!
text: Kisha akakumbuka. Kuna maonyesho leo! Mama Mbuzi, Mama Nguruwe na Mama Ng'ombe wameshaondoka. Mama kuku yuko tayari sasa. Atawachukua vifaranga vyake kwenye maonyesho. Moja, Mbili, Tatu, Nne, Tano, Sita!

SourceText: Mother Hen and her six chicks have a fantastic time at the fair. What fun! Her chicks were worth the wait.
text: Mama kuku na vifaranga vyake sita walikuwa na wakati mzuri kwenye maonyesho. Furaha iliyoje! vifaranga vyake vilistahili kusubiri.

SourceText: My First Day at School
text: Siku yangu ya kwanza shuleni

SourceText: Sesi is six years old and lives with her parents in Turiani. After her first day at school, she comes home and tells them something funny that happened at school. What do you think happened?
text: Sesi ana umri wa miaka sita na anaishi na wazazi wake Turiani. Baada ya siku yake ya kwanza shuleni, anarudi nyumbani na anasema jambo la kufurahisha lililotokea shule Unafikiri nini kilitokea?

SourceText: My name is Sesi. I am six years old. I am a new student at Manyinga Primary School.
text: Jina langu ni Sesi, Nina umri wa miaka sita. Ni mwanafunzi mpya katika shule hii ya Msingi ya Manyinga.

SourceText: My first day at school was exciting. I got up early in the morning. My father took me to school. On the way there were many other students.Some were with their parents.
text: Siku yangu ya kwanza Shuleni ilikuwa ni ya kufurahisha.Niliamka asubuhi na mapema, Baba yangu alinipeleka shuleni.Njiani kulikuwa na wanafunzi wengine wengi. Wengine walikuwa na wazazi wao.

SourceText: I heard the bell ringing, "Gong! Gong! Gong!" Other students started running.
text: Nilisikia kengele inalia, ''Gong! Gong! Gong!'' Wanafunzi wengine walianza kukimbia.

SourceText: Each student took his or her place in a line. I ran and joined the others. When I looked at the other students, I felt very small. They seemed much older than me.
text: Kila mwanafunzi alichukua nafasi yake kwenye mstari. Nilikimbia na kuungana nao. Nilipowatizama wanafunzi wengine, Nilijiona ni mdogo sana. Walionekana wakubwa zaidi yangu.

SourceText: An older girl took me by the hand to where students of my age were gathered. I was with the wrong class!
text: Msichana mkubwa alinishika mkono mpaka mahali ambapo wanafunzi wa rika langu walikuwa wamekusanyika. Nilienda kwenye darasa lingine kimakosa!

SourceText: As I stood in line with the students my age, I heard someone yell, "Madam, this boy has wet his shorts!" We all turned back. I saw a little boy holding his shorts, looking sad.
text: Nikiwa nimesimama kwenye mstari wenye wanafunzi wa rika langu, Nilimsikia mwanafunzi mmoja alipiga kelele,''Bibi, kaptura ya huyu mvulana imeloana! wote tuligeuka nyuma. Nikamuona mvulana mdogo ameshikilia kaptula yake, anaonekana mwenye huzuni.

SourceText: Both his legs were wet. His eyes were wet with tears. An older boy came and took him by the hand to get help.
text: Miguu yote miwili ilikuwa imeloana. Macho yake yalikuwa na machozi. Kijana mkubwa alikuja kumsaidia na alimshika mkono.

SourceText: Then a teacher showed us our classroom. It was large and clean.
text: Kisha mwalimu akatuonyesha darasa letu. lilikuwa kubwa na safi.

SourceText: One student came in late. He was holding his shoes. The teacher asked why. He said that his mother had taught him to always take off his shoes before stepping into a room. We all laughed.
text: Mwanafunzi mmoja aliingia kwa kuchelewa. Alikuwa ameshika viatu vyake. Mwalimu aliuliza kwanini. Alisema kwamba, mama yake amemfundisha kuwa awe anavua viatu kabla ya kuinga ndani ya chumba. Sote tulicheka.

SourceText: The bell rang again, "Gong! Gong! Gong!" We rushed outside and stood in lines. A teacher came to us and told us that it was break time. There was no need to stand in lines. It was time to play!
text: Kengele ilipigwa tena, Gong! Gong! Gong! Tulikimbia nje na kujipanga kwenye mistari. Mwalimu alikuja na kutuambia kuwa ilikuwa ni muda wa mapumziko. Hakukuwa na haja ya kusimama mstarini. Ulikuwa muda wa kucheza!

SourceText: After a short while, the bell rang again. All other students were rushing into their classrooms. I was confused, I did not know where to go. I had forgotten my classroom!
text: Baada ya muda mfupi, kengele ilipigwa tena. Wanafunzi wengine wote walikimbilia kwenye madarasa yao. Nilichanganyikiwa. Sikujua niende wapi. Nilisahau darasa langu!

SourceText: I saw a classroom in front of me and stepped inside. Two other students followed me. None of us knew where to go.
text: Niliona darasa mbele yangu na nikaingia ndani. Wanafunzi wengine wawili wakanifuata. Kati yetu hakuna aliyejua twende wapi.

SourceText: One of the students who was with me started crying. An older girl asked him what was wrong. He replied that he wanted to see his mother. Some of the other students laughed, but some wanted to help.
text: Mmoja wa wanafunzi aliyekuwa na mimi alianza kulia. Msichana mkubwa alimuuliza, tatizo ni nini. Alijibu kuwa anataka kumuona mama yake. Baadhi ya wanafunzi wengine walicheka, lakini wengine walitaka kusaidia.

SourceText: One of the older girls took us to our classroom. Our teacher told us that soon it would be time to go home, and we should wait for our parents to pick us up from the classroom.
text: Mmoja wa wasichana wakubwa alituchukua na kupeleka kwenye darasa letu. Mwalimu wetu alituamcia kwamba muda si mrefu ingekuwa muda wa kwenda nyumbani, na tunatakiwa kuwasubiri wazazi wetu kutuchukua kutoka darasani.

SourceText: The bell rang again, "Gong! Gong! Gong!" We were happy to see our parents waiting for us outside.
text: Kengele ilipigwa tena, Gong! Gong! Gong! Tulifurahi kuona wazazi wetu wakitusubiri nje.

SourceText: After dinner, my father and mother asked me what my day at school had been like. I told them about how we lost our classroom. They laughed and said I should listen carefully to the teachers.
text: Baada ya chakula cha jioni, Baba yangu na Mama waliniuliza siku yangu ilikuwaje shule. Niliwambia kuhusu jinsi tulivyopotea darasa letu. Walicheka na kusema natakiwa kusikiliza walimu kwa umakini.

SourceText: That night, I couldn't sleep. The night was long and I was eager to start my second day of school.
text: Usiku ule, sikuweza kulala. Usiku ulikuwa mrefu na nilitamani kuanza siku yangu ya pili ya shule.

SourceText: Nichchumani Helps Out
text: Neli anatoa msaada

SourceText: Nichchumani wants to help Pichhu, a lost and injured duckling. She takes her home, but she only finds more trouble there!
text: Neli anataka kumsaidia Pichhu, bata aliyepotea na aliyeumia. Alimchukua nyumbani kwake, lakini anapata shida zaidi hapo!

SourceText: One day, Nichchumani went out for a walk and saw a lost duckling crying. "Why are you crying?" she asked.
text: Siku moja, Neli alikwenda nje kutembea na akamuona bata aliyepotea analia. ''Kwanini unalia?'' aliuliza.

SourceText: Poor Pichchu the duckling was hurt. She couldn't swim or play or do any of her favorite things. "Don't worry," said Nichchumani. "We will get you all fixed up!"
text: Maskini Pichchu bata alieumia. Hawezi kuogelea wala kucheza wala kufanya vitu anavyovipenda. ''Usiwe na wasiwasi,'' alisema Neli. Tutakushughulikia!''

SourceText: Uh Oh! Kitty spied Pichchu while she was taking a nap. "What a good snack," purred kitty.
text: Uh Oh! Kitty alimpeleleza Pichhu alipokuwa amepumzika. Ni vitafunwa vizuri,'' Paka msafi.

SourceText: "KITTY, NO!" cried Nichchumani, as she grabbed kitty.
text: ''KITTY, Hapana''Nichchumani alilia, anapomkamata paka.

SourceText: Poor Pichchu needed to go see a doctor. Nichchumani carried her all the way there.
text: Maskini Pichchu anahitaji kumuona Daktari. Neli alimbeba njia nzima.

SourceText: The doctor helped Pichchu and soon she was all better!
text: Doctor alimsaidia Pichchu na muda si mrefu alikuwa vizuri!

SourceText: Soon, Pichchu's mother found her.
text: Muda si mrefu. Mama yake Pichchu alimpata.

SourceText: She took her home so she could swim and play and do all of her favorite things.
text: Alimchukua nyumbani ili aogelee na kucheza na kufanya michezo yote anayoipenda.

SourceText: "Bye, Pichchu!" waved Nichchumani and her friends.
text: ''Kwaheri, Pichchu!'' Neli alimpungia rafiki yake.

SourceText: No Smiles Today
text: Hamna Kucheka Leo

SourceText: Shanti was a happy girl. No one had seen her sad or quiet. Then one day she went very quiet. What had happened to Shanti?
text: Shanti alikuwa msichana mchangamfu. Hamna aliyewahi kumwona akiwa amesononeka au akiwa mkimya. Kisha siku moja alinyamaza tu. Ni kipi kilitokea kwa Shanti?

SourceText: Shanti and Arun were good friends. They had so much fun together. They shared secrets in class. They ran races on the way home. She was always cheerful.
text: Shanti na Aruna walikuwa marafiki wa chanda na pete. Walikuwa na wakati mzuri sana pamoja. Walibadilishana siri zao darasani. Walikimbizana walipokuwa wanarudi nyumbani. Shanti alikuwa mchangamfu saa zote.

SourceText: One day, Shanti came into the classroom slowly. Her head was bent. She looked sad. "Did someone scold you?" asked Arun. Shanti shook her head. She sat down and did not look up. She did not answer ‘Present!’ when Sona Miss called her name. Sona Miss called again, louder this time, "Shanti Kumar!" Shanti raised her hand.
text: Siku moja,Shanti alikuja darasani pole pole. Alikuwa amesononeka. "Kuna aliyekuhudhi?" Aruna aliuliza. Shanti alitikisa kichwa chake. Aliketi chini na hakuangalia juu tena. Wala hakujibu "Nipo"mwalimu Sona alipoita jina lake.Bi.Sona aliita tena. Kwa sauti safari hii. "Shanti Karama!" Shanti aliinua mkono wake.

SourceText: "Do you have a sore throat?" her teacher asked her. Shanti shook her head. Her cheeks were red and it looked like she had a fever. "Are you feeling okay?" Sona Miss asked. Shanti nodded, still not daring to look up.
text: "Una homa?" mwalimu aliuliza. Shanti alitikisa Kichwa chake. Mashavu yake yallikuwa mekundu na alionekana kuwa na homa. "Uko salama?" Sona aliuliza. Shanti alitikisa kichwa, bado hakuangalia juu.

SourceText: "Why does Shanti look so sad?" "Is your little brother okay?" "Is your puppy okay?" "Is your grandmother okay?" Shanti kept nodding her head to each of her friends. But she did not look up.
text: "Mbona Shanti amekasirika?" "Mdogo wako yuko salama?" "Na mbwa wako yuko salama?" "Na Bibi yako yuko salama?" Shanti alizidi kuonyesha ishara ya kuitikia kwa kutikisa kichwa tu kwa kila rafiki yake. Ila hakuangalia juu.

SourceText: Arun wanted to make her smile. He had an idea! He took out something from his bag. As he ran to show it to Shanti, it slipped out of his hands. Shanti saw something flying towards her and she grabbed it.
text: Aruna alitaka kumfanya atabasamu. Alikuwa na wazo! Alichukua kitu kutoka kwenye mkoba wake. Alipokuwa anakimbia kumwonyesha, ilimponyoka kutoka mkononi kwake, Shanti aliona kitu kinapepea kuelekea kwake na akakikamata.

SourceText: It was a BIG, green, rubber frog! Shanti's eyes flew open. Then she opened her mouth to laugh. THEN Arun and her friends saw why she had not smiled or talked all day! Four of her front teeth had gone missing!
text: Alikuwa chura mkubwa na wakijani. Shanti alikodoa macho. Kisha akafungua mdomo wake kucheka. Kisha Aruna na rafiki zake wakaona sababu iliyomfanya asicheke siku nzima! Meno yake manne ya mbele yalikuwa yamengóka!

SourceText: Pishi and Me
text: Pishi na Mimi

SourceText: Chutku returns from his walks with his aunt, his pocket full of treasures and stories. Narrated from a child’s point of view, this is the story of the heartwarming relationship between an aunt and her nephew.
text: Chacha alirudi kutoka matembezi na shangazi yake, mfuko wake ukiwa umejaa hazina na hadithi. Alisimulia kutokana na uelewa wa mtoto, hii ni hadithi ya uhusiano mzuri sana kati ya shangazi na mpwa wake.

SourceText: I love going for walks. Especially with my Pishi.
text: Napenda kwenda matembezi. Hasa na Pishi wangu.

SourceText: I like it when Pishi holds my hand. But I like it even more... when she lets it go.
text: Napenda pale Pishi anaponishika mkono wangu. Lakini napenda zaid... pale anapouachia.

SourceText: We never walk fast. We often stop to say hello to...
text: Kamwe hatutembei kwa haraka. Mara nyingi tunasimama kusalimia...

SourceText: a dog, a cat, a rat, a crow, a tree.
text: mbwa, Paka, Panya, Kunguru, Mti.

SourceText: Pishi loves picking up flowers from the street. I love picking up stones. Big ones, small ones, round ones, flat ones.
text: Pishi anapenda kuokota maua kutoka mtaani. Napenda kuokota mawe. Makubwa, madogo, ya mviringo, membamba.

SourceText: But the best are the really tiny ones. So tiny, they get lost in my pocket.
text: Lakini nzuri zaidi ni zile ndogo kweli. Ndogo sana, zimepotea ndani ya mfuko wangu.

SourceText: My pockets are full of things after my walks with Pishi.
text: Mfuko wangu umejaa vitu baada ya matembezi yangu na Pishi.

SourceText: Today, Ajji gave me a pod of peas from her basket.
text: Leo, Furaha alinipa ganda la njegere kutoka kwenye kikapu chake.

SourceText: Dilip bhau gave me this clip from his magical shop.
text: Dilip bhau alinipa kipande kutoka kwenye duka lake la maajabu.

SourceText: Nirmal didi gave me this sticker for quietly waiting, waiting and waiting.
text: Nimal didi alinipa kibandiko hiki kwajili ya kusubiri, kusubiri, na kusubiri.

SourceText: Anjum aunty gave me this button from her big button jar.
text: Shangazi yake Shukuru alinipa kitufe hiki kutoka kwenye mtungi wake mkubwa wa kitufe.

SourceText: When I get home, I’ll empty my pockets and keep it all in my yellow box.
text: Nitakapofika nyumbani, Nitaiacha mifuko yangu ikiwa mitupu na nitavitunza vyote kwenye boksi langu la njano.

SourceText: If I find the tiny stone in my pocket, I’ll give it to my Pishi.
text: Kama nitakuta jiwe dogo kwenye mfuko wangu, nitampa Pishi wangu.

SourceText: Tra's Red Bean Plant
text: Mmea wa maharagwe mekundu wa Tra

SourceText: Tra is excited about her birthday gift. It's three red bean seeds and a book about gardening. She plants her seeds and waters them daily. But for some reason her plant begins to droop. What could be wrong?
text: Tiara amefurahishwa na zawadi yake ya kumbukizi ya siku ya kuzaliwa kwake. Ni mbegu tatu za maharage mekundu na kitabu kuhusu bustani. Aliizipanda mbegu na kuzimwagilia kila siku. Lakini kwasababu flani mmea wake ulianza kudhoofika. Nini kinaweza kuwa ni tatizo?

SourceText: © Room to Read, 2012. Some rights reserved. Released under CC BY 4.0 license.
text: © Mahali pa kusoma, 2012. Haki zingine zimehifadhiwa. Imetolewa chini ya leseni ya CC. BY. 4.0.

SourceText: On her birthday, Tra's mother gave her a special gift. "Wow! Red beans and a gardening book," Tra said. "Now I can grow my own red bean plant."
text: Siku ya kumbukizi ya kuzaliwa kwake, Mama yake Tiara alimpa zawadi maalumu. "Wow! maharage mekundu na kitabu cha bustani," alisema Tiara. "Sasa naweza kupanda mmea wangu mwenyewe wa maharager mekundu."

SourceText: First, plant the seed, Tra read. So she did. "You’re doing great, Tra!" the book told her.
text: Kwanza, panda mbegu, Tiara alisoma. Alifanya hivyo. "Unafanya vizuri, Tiara!" kitabu kilimwambia.

SourceText: Now, water it. La La La! Tra sang as she did just that.
text: Sasa, mwagilia. La La La! Tiara aliimba alipofanya hivyo tu.

SourceText: "My red bean plant will soon grow up," Tra told her friends. "You have to water it a lot to keep it healthy," they said. "Just like kids have to drink a lot of milk to grow big and strong!"
text: " Mmea wangu wa maharage mwekundu utakuwa muda si mrefu," Tiara aliwaambia marafiki zake. "Unatakiwa kuumwagilia sana kuufanya uwe na afya," walisema. Kama vile watoto wanatakiwa kunywa maziwa mengi ili kukua na wawe imara!"

SourceText: A few days later, the red bean sprouted. "Look, Mom!" Tra called. "It's growing!"
text: Siku chache baadae, harage jekundu lilichomoza." tazama Mama!" Tiara aliita. "Linakua!"

SourceText: The next morning, Tra watered her plant again. "La La La! Drink, drink, drink!" she sang. "If you drink more water, you'll grow up faster!" "Oh my, Tra, not like that!" said the book.
text: Asubuhi iliyofuata, Tiara alimwagilia tena mmea wake. "La La La! Kunywa kunywa, kunywa!" aliimba. Kama utakunywa maji zaidi, utakua haraka!" "Oh Tiara wangu sio hivyo!" kilisema kitabu.

SourceText: Tra watered again at noon. La La La! "Oh my, Tra!" the book said, louder now. "My pages say not to water a plant at noon."
text: Tiara alimwagilia tena mchana. La La La! "Oh Tiara wangu!" Kitabu kilisema, kwa sauti sasa. "Kurasa zangu zinasema usimwagililie mmea mchana."

SourceText: But Tra kept right on watering. La La La, La La La! Oh my, Tra! You've forgotten to read me!
text: Lakini Tiara aliendelea kumwagilia. La La La La La La! Oh Tiara wangu, Umesahau kunisoma!

SourceText: The next day, Tra gave her mother instructions as she left for school. "Give my plant more water at noon, please!" "Have you read the book?" her mother asked.
text: Siku iliyofuata, Tiara alimpa Mama yake maelekezo kwakuwa alikuwa anaenda shule. "Mwagilia mmea wangu maji mengi zaidi mchana, tafadhali!" " Umesoma kitabu?" Mama yake aliuliza.

SourceText: "In my pages, it says to water the plant only once a day,"the book said sadly. Oh my, Tra!
text: "Kwenye kurasa zangu, Inasema inabidi kumwagilia mmea mara moja tu kwa siku," kitabu kilisema kwa huzuni. Oh Tiara wangu!

SourceText: Three days later, Tra was sad, too. "My poor plant!" she cried.
text: Siku tatu baadae, Tiara alihuzunika pia. " Maskini mmea wangu!" alilia.

SourceText: At school, she talked to her friends. "I have been taking such good care of my plant. Why is it so sad?" "What does the book say?" they asked.
text: Shuleni, alizungumza na rafiki zake. "Nimekuwa nikiutunza vizuri sana mmea wangu. Kwanini unasikitika?" "Kitabu kinasemaje?" waliuliza.

SourceText: "Oh my," Tra said. "I stopped reading it."
text: "Oh Tiara wangu" alisema. "Niliacha kukisoma."

SourceText: At home, Tra showed the plant to her mother. "I'm sorry, Mom," Tra said. "I'm going to read the book now." "That's a great idea," her mother replied.
text: Nyumbani Tiara alimuonyesha mmea mama yake."Samahani, Mama, "Tiara alisema."Naenda kusoma kitabu sasa." "Hilo ni wazo zuri," alijibu Mama yake.

SourceText: Do not water the plant too much, or its roots will become soggy. Tra read. The leaves will then droop and turn brown.
text: Usimwagilie mmea kwa maji mengi, au mizizi yake itakuwa laini. Tiara amesoma. Kisha majani yataangua na kubadilika kuwa yaa kahawia.

SourceText: "I’m so sorry, Red Bean," Tra whispered.
text: "Samahani sana, harage jekundu" Tiara alinong"ona.

SourceText: "The plant won’t be sad, because he knows you love him," her mother said. "You can show him your love by learning how to take good care of him."
text: "Mmea hauwezi kusikitika, sababu unajua unaupenda," Mama yake alisema. " Unaweza kuuonyesha upendo wako kwa kujifunza jinsi ya kuutunza."

SourceText: "You can also say sorry to the book, because you ignored her. She needs your attention, too!"
text: "Unaweza pia kukiambia kitabu samahani. sababu ulikidharau. Kinahitaji umakini wako pia!"

SourceText: A few days later, Red Bean was healthy again. Now Tra and her gardening book were best friends!
text: Siku chache baadae, harage jekundu lilikuwa na afya tena. Sasa Tiara na kitabu chake cha bustani walikuwa marafiki wakubwa!

SourceText: Under My Bed
text: Chini ya Kitanda changu

SourceText: Sometimes strange things lurk under my bed. Would you like to know what I found the other night?
text: Wakati mwingine vitu vigeni hujificha chini ya kitanda changu. Ungependa kujua nilichopata usiku mmoja?

SourceText: © Pratham Books, 2015. Some rights reserved. Released under CC BY 4.0 license.
text: © Vitabu vya Pratham, 2015. Haki zingine zimehifadhiwa. Imetolewa chini ya leseni ya CC BY 4.0.

SourceText: I wake up at night feeling thirsty. I want to get some water. I start looking for my slippers under the bed.
text: Naamka usiku nikasikia kiu. Nahitaji maji. Naanza kutafuta ndala zangu chini ya kitanda.

SourceText: Oh my God! There is a tiger under my bed.
text: Mungu wangu! Kuna duma chini ya kitanda changu.

SourceText: Now what should I do?
text: Sasa nifanyeje?

SourceText: Should I call Ma? What if the tiger roars?
text: Nimpigie Mama? Na duma akiunguruma?

SourceText: Should I just go back to sleep? But I am not sleepy any more.
text: Au labda nirudi kulala? Ila sipati usingizi tena.

SourceText: Then someone turns on the light. Ma is standing at the door.
text: Kisha mtu anawasha taa. Mama amesimama mlangoni.

SourceText: "What happened dear?Did you call me?" asks Ma.
text: "Nini kimetokea mpendwa? Uliniita?" Mama anauliza.

SourceText: I point towards the tiger. Ma bends and pulls the tiger out from under the bed!
text: Namuelekeza kwa duma. Mama anainama na anaangalia chini ya kitanda.

SourceText: Hey, this is no tiger. This is my thick yellow and black sweater. Its buttons shine like a tiger's eyes.
text: Wewe! Huyu si duma,ni fulana kubwa nyeusi inayofanana na ngozi ya duma.

SourceText: I got scared for nothing! Ma gets me some water.
text: Niliogopa bure. Mama ananisaidia na maji.

SourceText: Now I will sleep. And dream about real tigers in a jungle!
text: Sasa nitalala. Na nitaota na duma wa kweli wa porini.

SourceText: A Very Green Day
text: Siku ya Kijani sana

SourceText: Greeny has so much energy. She doesn't want to nap! One day, she decides to run away. After playing in the hot sun for a while, Greeny gets tired and wants to go home. But now she's lost! How will she get home to her dad?
text: Pendo ana nguvu sana. Hataki kulala usingizi! Siku moja, aliamua kukimbilia mbali. Baada ya kucheza kwenye jua kali kwa muda, Pendo alichoka na alitaka kwenda nyumbani. Lakini sasa amepotea! Atarudi vipi nyumbani kwa baba yake?

SourceText: © Room to Read, 2013. Some rights reserved. Released under CC BY 4.0 license.
text: ©Mahali pa kusoma, 2013. Haki zingine zimehifadhiwa. Imetolewa chini ya leseni ya CC BY 4.0.

SourceText: Greeny doesn’t want to nap. Today, she wants to be a tree!
text: Leo, Kijani hataki kupumzika, anataka kuwa mti!

SourceText: Trees don’t need naps!
text: Miti haihitaji kupumzika!

SourceText: Trees can play all day long.
text: Miti inaweza kucheza siku nzima.

SourceText: Trees only need to be green.
text: Miti inahitaji kuwa ya kijani tu.

SourceText: Uh-oh. Dad can’t find Greeny.
text: Uh. oh Baba hamuoni Pendo.

SourceText: She’s hiding among the trees.
text: Anajificha katikati ya miti.

SourceText: It's so fun to be a tree!
text: Inafurahisha sana kuwa mti!

SourceText: But it is a bit hot playing under the sun, isn't it?
text: Lakini kuna joto kidogo kucheza chini ya jua. si ndivyo?

SourceText: Actually, it’s too hot!
text: Kwa kweli, ni joto sana!

SourceText: What should Greeny do?
text: Pendo afanye nini?

SourceText: Should she go home to Dad?
text: Je aende nyumbani kwa Baba?

SourceText: But where is home? Greeny is lost!
text: Lakini nyumbani ni wapi? Pendo amepotea!

SourceText: Dad is looking for Greeny. Greeny keeps walking until she reaches a river.
text: Baba anamtafuta Pendo. Pendo anaendelea kutembea mpaka anafika mtoni.

SourceText: Tired and scared, Greeny bursts into tears. Her tears cause the river to flood!
text: Nimechoka na ninaogopa, Pendo anatokwa na machozi. Machozi yake yanasababisha mto ufurike!

SourceText: The whole city is flooded!
text: Jiji lote limefurika!

SourceText: Ah! Greeny has an idea. She will write messages for Dad on her leaves.
text: Ah! Pendo ana wazo. Ataandika ujumbe kwaajili ya Baba yake kwenye majani yake.

SourceText: The green world helps her too.
text: Dunia ya kijani ilimsaidia pia.

SourceText: Thanks to the green world, Dad finally gets her messages.
text: Asante kwa dunia ya kijani, hatimae baba amepata ujumbe wake.

SourceText: Dad finds Greeny!
text: Baba amempata Pendo!

SourceText: DADDY! GREENY!
text: BABA! PENDO!

SourceText: Greeny is so tired. Now, all she wants is her nap.
text: Pendo amechoka sana. Sasa anachotaka tu ni kulala.

SourceText: "Greeny, get ready for school!" her dad calls. "No," she says. "I’m a cat today. Cats don’t go to school so early."
text: ''Pendo, jiandae kwenda shule! Baba yake anaita.''Hapana'' anasema.'' Mimi leo ni paka. Paka haendi shule mapema sana.''

SourceText:
8 Steps to becoming a tree (written and performed by Greeny)
1. Find a pot.
2. Fill it with soil.
3. Plant your feet inside. 
4. Branch out your two hands.
text:
Hatua nane za kuwa mti(Imeandikwa na ilifaanywa na Pendo)
1. Tafuta chungu.
2. Jaza udongo.
3. Weka miguu yako ndani.
4. Nyoosha mikono yako kuwa matawi.

SourceText:
5. Water the plant.
6. Add fertilizer.
7. Wait.
8. Ta-da!
Congratulations, you are now a tree.
text: Hongera, sasa wewe ni mti.

SourceText:
Caution:
Sometimes, there may be incidents of incomplete change, as follows:
1. No change at all.
2. Thorns all over the body.
3. Becoming as stiff as wood.
4. Becoming a bush.
Oops! Just try again.
text:
Tahadhari:
Wakati mwingine, kunaweza kuwa na mabadiliko yasiyokamilika, kama ifuatavyo:
1. Hakuna mabadiliko kabisa.
2. Miiba mwili mzima.
3. Kuwa mgumu kama kuni.
4. Kuwa kichaka.
Oops! Jaribu tu tena.
